attributes.action: Talk seriously to the President of the USA about the so called "special relationship" ,so that immigration can be made fairer to Brits who are excluded from the Green Card Lottery.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Bill for the Green Card Lottery introduced by Senator Edward Kennedy, came into being a while back but English and Scottish and Northern Irish Citizens are excluded from entering the lottery.

The argument for this is that the Brits have a better chance of getting into the USA via "other visa methods" as they have a good level of education. This seems unfair bearing in mind that the Irish Education system is just as good!
What happened to the special relationship? Lets make it a fair playing field.
